cpl.readme:
This is a simple task list for tiddlywiki. To add the task list to a tiddler put `{{$:/plugins/OokTech/SimpleTaskList/Simple Task List}}` inside a tidler.

Add tasks by using the input at the top of the list, you can limit the number of tasks shown in the finished list using the `limit list size input`

License: [[BSD 3 Clause|$:/plugins/OokTech/SimpleTaskList/License]]

Creator: [[OokTech|$:/plugins/OokTech/OokTechInfo]]

Source: [[GitHub|https://https://github.com/OokTech/TW5-SimpleTaskList]]
